title: Testnet campaign  open registration
description: Registration required a Relayer ID. Drew Stone introduces the campaign, goals, overview, and our team provides a guided walkthrough.

title: Live-stream session introducing campaign, challenges, platform features
Share blog post outlining competition rules, scoring categories, and non-financial incentives
Kick off Phase 1 of testnet campaign
Daily updates on scoreboard standings and highlights from participants
Live-stream Q&A session to address any issues or questions that have arisen during Phase 1
Begin Phase 2, focusing on throughput and performance optimization
Daily updates on scoreboard standings and highlights from participants
Announce winners of Phase 1 and distribute non-financial incentives
Live-stream session discussing Phase 2 progress and strategies for optimization
Start Phase 3, emphasizing security and stress testing of the platform
Daily updates on scoreboard standings and highlights from participants
Announce winners of Phase 2 and distribute non-financial incentives
Live-stream session on security best practices and addressing concerns from participants
Announce partnerships with other projects or communities for cross-platform events and challenges
Host various events, challenges, and workshops in collaboration with partner projects or communities
Live-stream session showcasing innovative solutions and ideas from the collaboration week
Final week of the testnet campaign begins
Daily updates on scoreboard standings and highlights from participants
Close the testnet campaign and announce the winners of Phase 3 and overall campaign winners. Distribute non-financial incentives
Live-stream wrap-up event, celebrating achievements and discussing future developments based on the testnet campaign insights
Publish a comprehensive report on the testnet campaign, including insights, lessons learned, and plans for future improvements
Host an Ask Me Anything (AMA) session with the development team, addressing community questions and feedback
Share blog post outlining the roadmap for future development, incorporating the learnings and feedback from the testnet campaign
